1611840.name: Formula Team
1611840.description:
Formula team management. The Formula Team will allow you to play the role of a team director, the success of the entire team will depend on you.

If you are a huge Formula fan and have always been excited about the racing atmosphere? This game is made just for you. That game that truly reflects the real thrill of the sport.

Thanks to this game you will be able to experience real racing emotions. You will be closer to these emotions than you can imagine. You'll be responsible for planning, coordination, logistics, and even the color of the car, for literally every detail. You need passion, commitment and experience to be successful.
Formula Simulator offers a very realistic approach to the fastest world of motorsport.

Set up your own team, choose drivers, adapt everything to your own taste and participate in ruthless races. The speed and excitement involved at every corner of Formula Team sets it apart from all the other different types of racing games. The sound effects in the game combined with the high-quality graphics create a truly immersive racing experience.


To perform your best, your vehicle has to be in its best condition. In order to achieve that, you have a chance to repair all the parts of the formula and be fully prepared for success.


If you are a big fan of racing, this is the closest thing you will get to a real life experience when not in the car. Don't miss out on an opportunity to participate in ruthless races and reach greatness by taking the first place.


Maybe you have found a vehicle in inventory that you love, but you still feel like there is something missing, well we have got good news for you. You are in full charge of the modification of the car.


If participating in international races is what excites you, Formula Team allows you to fly over to different destinations, however you have to first master the techniques of planning, building and managing air cargo operations on available budget.
1611840.supported_languages:
英语*, 波兰语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
